fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: Revision of vehicle type approval legislation, telematics/connected cars legislation, competition policy regarding the automotive industry.
organisation_name: AUTIG - Danish Automotive Trade & Industry Federation (AUTIG)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: AUTIG is a member of CLEPA (European Association of Automotive Suppliers), FIGIEFA (International Federation of Automotive Aftermarket Distributors), SMEdenmark (Danish Federation of Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises)
goals__remit: AUTIG represents the interests of >100 manufacturers of automotive components and automotive aftermarket distributors. Our activities focus on promotion and maintenance of free competition in the market for vehicle parts, servicing and repair.
